description:
Another suitor blasts his way into the picture, this time quite literally, as he wears an armored rocket suit.  He decided to cut straight to the point and keeps trying to snatch Lala.  Lala is able to dodge his attacks, but she finally get frustrated and fights back.  Wounded and with his armor damaged, he wander about, seeking advice from everyone, even Ren.  He comes up with a new plan to claim Lala and attempts to drug her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: From a Shining Star, with Love
